phrases: Say, Nana Komatsu.
Do you remember the first time we met?
I am the type who does not believe in fate one bit.
I think this was all a coincidence.
When I was darkness at that time
With trembling lips
The more I struggle
The more this wound deepens
The broken promise hurt me
Nobody can save me
God, I have only one request
Stop tearing apart my love
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
I need your love
I am a broken rose
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I am a broken rose
I want to need your love
I thought it was Nana's room?
No, this is my room.
I am the master here, you know.
You are?
You know what?
I have been really exhausted as of late.
Even though you play a small role?
Hey, you are no different.
I am exhausted because of Nana.
Ah, the Nana also known as Hachi.
I see.
Why will not Nana get it into her head?
It is been one headache after another ever since she moved to Tokyo.
It is spring!
Spring has finally come!
After the long wait, spring has arrived!
Nana says she is on her way to Tokyo.
- Y-Yes?! - Y-Yes?!
One ticket to Tokyo.
One way.
Okay, then.
Let us make a toast.
A toast to what?
Well...
To Shoji passing the University exams!
No, that has nothing to do with me.
Then, can we at least drink to this unique moment?
Hey, I like that.
To two girls, the same age,
arriving in Tokyo at the same time on the same train.
That is quite a coincidence, do not you think?
And to one more thing.
My name is Nana too, Nana.
Nana!
That is you, right, Nana?!
No way!
What a coincidence!
Who are you?
Am I such a forgettable person?
Sorry, sorry.
Are you all right, Nana-chan?
So you do remember.
Then starting tomorrow, we are roommates, Nana-chan.
What in the world were you thinking?!
Why not?
Sharing is cool!
Like the foreigners do!
You are so easily fooled by others!
I do not think it is a good idea for you to move in with a complete stranger.
What were you thinking?
Okay, I got it.
Let us live together.
You would not want to live with me.
You will hate it.
I am always wanting my own way, and I whine.
You think I do not know that?
I am used to it, or rather, I have given up about that.
How dare you!
Just kidding.
Let us do it, okay?
Shoji...
Thank you.
That makes me happy.
But I cannot!
Those words were all I needed to hear.
You have chosen me over Sachiko.
Who the heck is Sachiko?
You are just too kind.
If we live together,
I am going to rely on you too much all the time.
I do not want to be a burden anymore than I already am.
Her effort in not wanting to be a burden is splendid for Nana's standards,
or so I thought at the time.
But it was just a matter of Nana now relying on someone else instead.
The other Nana.
Although that is also what you would expect of her.
Hey Nana, do not you think these cups are super cute?
You would never imagine they are only a dollar each.
Strawberries?
No?
If you want it, go ahead and buy it.
Forget it then.
Why?!
Because.
If you are not interested, I do not want it either.
I want to use the same things you do.
I do not care what we use.
Let us just get the shopping done.
But you do not like this, do you?
The strawberries.
Ah, sure I love strawberries...
Then I am getting these.
I feel for Shoji.
What is that supposed to mean?
Well, you are like...
You know, kind of like a dog.
I am?
You kind of stick around friendly-like and you are real sincere,
but you need a lot of caring.
Like, not that I mind,
I was thinking about getting a pet anyway.
Hey Hachi, want me to buy you a toy?
Hachi?
Do not you have a cuter name for me?
So you guys are Nana and Hachi?
What a combination.
Well, actually my name is Nana too,
but it is confusing to have the same name, so Nana...
Was that the reason?
It is because you are like a pet dog.
- Beer. Want some? - Yay!
No, not yay!
You got work, remember?
But I am thirsty!
No, I am hungry!
I should have bought something!
By the way, I ate the hamburger.
It was awesome good!
Thanks.
You ate it all by yourself.
Not fair!
Well then, write do not eat on the darn thing next time!
Found a cute bakery!
They all look really good!
I do not know which one to get!
You really do have a good nose, do not you?
Being a dog.
Hey Nana.
I have been looking for this CD.
Would you mind if we look in that shop?
I do not mind, but do you have a CD player?
Well, if you want to use mine, that is fine by me.
Thank you!
Great, they still had a few left!
The new Trapnest album went on sale today!
I just love them.
If you would like, you should listen to them, too.
They are super cool.
Hang on a minute while I go and pay for this.
You like this?
I got it from a street vendor.
It is a Sid Vicious pad lock.
And who are you?
Nancy?
So what are you going to do putting a lock on me?
Hey Ren.
If I were to die, would you die with me?
Okay.
The other Nana also seems to have quite a history.
You got that right.
You know, it is as if the more she became closer to the other Nana,
the more the distance between she and Shoji increased.
That is right.
I should have known there was something going on,
you finding a job so quickly.
Did not expect such a young boss.
Koichi Sato!
Another burger please.
You got it.
Hey, you know I do not care.
As long as you have a job.
Never mind the reasons for sticking to it.
Just do not give Shoji a hard time.
Like last night, too, he got drunk and started saying stuff.
Saying stuff?!
Last night, too?
Is he always saying stuff about me?
Uh...
So actually, Shoji really does not like me!
Because I am good for nothing!
It is not like that.
Shoji is so in love with you,
he does not know what to do with himself.
You are not going to find a man like that just anywhere,
you know that?
You got to take better care of him, man.
Otherwise that is when heaven'll get you back.
Work again?
What are you working so much for?
Your parents send you money, do not they?
Not enough to live on.
When I start school, I will not have time to work.
I have got to save up while I can.
That is what you say.
You are not spending money on Sachiko, I hope!
Buying her Louis Vuitton bags and Prada shoes.
But she really likes these brands.
I am just kidding!
You are the one that keeps bringing her up!
I know, but I came all the way to Tokyo to be with you
and you spend all of your time working.
I just wish you would make some time for me.
You are the one that is not being considerate.
Why should I always have to adjust to your plans?
I have got to go to work now, so I am off.
I just remembered.
You sent me an email yesterday.
Huh?
Well, if it is not important, never mind.
It is just that I fell asleep without noticing it came.
Sorry.
Oh yeah, I did send one.
What did I write?
Shoji, I am on my way home.
Call me when you get off work.
What did I write?
Shoji, I am on my way home.
Call me when you get off work.
Come on, do not look so gloomy.
Right.
Love will always have its ups and downs.
Oh, by the way, that band of the other Nana!
They have got their band members now, do not they?
Y-Yeah, you are right.
That is the flower of the lotus, is not it?
Why did you choose the lotus?
Actually, it is the ren.
Huh?
Sui-ren?
Just plain ren.
You mean lotus.
I said no.
But that is totally a lotus.
Oh shut up!
But it definitely is a lotus.
Why are you being so stubborn?
Who is the stubborn one?!
Who could it be at this time of night?
Good evening.
Nobu!
What the heck are you doing here?!
Oh wonderful!
The exact response I was expecting!
Good!
Get outta here.
Go home!
Nana!
Please!
Let me stay here just one night!
No way.
- In fact, I... - I do not want to hear it.
I ran away from home.
I told you, I do not want to hear it!
Nana!
It is for him.
He needs to smarten up!
Now you listen to me, Nobu.
You are to follow your father's footsteps and run that huge Japanese inn.
Get it through your head.
I did not choose to be born into that family.
Quit being a brat about it!
As long as I can play my guitar, I am happy.
And I want to play for you.
Do not make me repeat myself.
Hello Yasu?
Do something about this stupid son, will ya?!
Oh sorry, but he insisted that he would go.
What do you mean, but?!
What are you going to do about it?!
There is nothing I can do about it, Nana.
Nobu's serious.
Why do not you find...
some new band members and start over?
Oh by the way, did ya listen to the tape?
Tape?
The new number Nobu wrote.
It is good.
If you sing it, in my opinion, nobody's got a chance over you guys.
What is this?
Man, only one guest in the house tonight?
Pretty shabby if you ask me.
Oh, well, I guess that is how it is when just starting off.
One's better than none.
Good evening.
We are Blast.
Good evening...
I will make this a night you will never forget.
Looking for a drummer and bassist!
Want To join our band and go pro?
Those of you who like the Sex Pistols Ask the store clerk for details
I just saw the poster out front.
Ow!
Nana!
I am sorry, did I do something weird?
No, it is not that at all.
You just surprised us.
You are a lot better than we expected.
What do you think, Nana?
This kid's good.
Let us let him in, okay?
So, your name's, Shinichi.
Is that right?
Yes.
Name a guitarist you respect.
Ren Honjo!
There is one thing you have to promise me first.
If you cannot, then you are going to hafta decline right this moment.
Shin, do better than Ren.
Yes!
Of course, that is what I intend to do.
Is not that wonderful?
You found such a great bass player in such a short time!
And he is cute!
So who do you have to thank?
Hey, who do you have to thank?
You want a prize that badly?
Let us see, then...
Do not litter!
Thank you, Hachiko.
I-I thought you did not hit on women!
It is not right!
I have a boyfriend!
What is she getting all uptight about over a kiss?
It is not like she is a virgin.
Say, should not you call Natsuko and thank her?
I will do it later.
Oh, I see.
If you call now, you would be embarrassed
because you will cry the moment you hear mommy's voice.
Well, sure.
You get homesick too, sometimes, do not you, Nana?
No, since I do not have a home.
There you go, trying to be cool again.
Yasu, Blast is the band you started.
Yeah.
I was so worried I could not sleep at night.
Besides, there are law firms in Tokyo too.
The other Nana began to sing, and she now has her band members.
I will bet every day is new and inspiring for Nana.
Yeah, but she is practically ignored Shoji.
And as if to fill that gap in Shoji's life... in comes Sachiko.
That is right.
The real Sachiko.
My name is Sachiko Kawamura.
It is nice to meet you.
Your first name?
Sachiko.
Do you...
Do you like Louis Vuitton and Prada?
Huh?
I get it.
Well, I was just as surprised.
You have the same employer, go to the same university,
and enroll at the same faculty.
Guess you pretty well hafta get along.
Yes, but Sachiko was accepted on her first try,
so she is two years younger.
Sachiko?
I cannot help it.
She asked me to call her that.
There was no reason to refuse.
She is clearly your type.
Petite and fair-skinned.
You cannot help it.
But I am telling you, it is not like that!
I am proud that you are holding back.
She is back.
Here, Shoji.
Is coffee okay?
Yeah.
Thanks.
Mr. Kyosuke, which would you prefer?
Just call me Kyosuke, Sa-chan.
That is going to be trouble.
But even I find her cute.
This is definitely bad.
Oh!
My shoe!
Shoji!
Huh?!
Sorry, Shoji.
Go on ahead.
You will miss the last train!
Hey!
You knew you would hafta run for the last train.
So why did you hafta wear those shoes?
I did it on purpose.
This seriously does not look good.
I did it on purpose.
It is her secret weapon.
I did it on purpose.
- So, what are you going to do about it? -
What are you going to do about it?
So, there you have it.
Well, that all depends on whether or not
the Demon Lord wants it or not.
Bye-bye.
- Good-bye. - Good-bye.
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
